text:
Family members of JNUSU president Kanhaiya Kumar met him in Tihar jail on Tuesday and delivered his mother’s message, which said he should neither worry nor give any explanation to prove his innocence.

Kanhaiya’s elder brother Manikant and his uncle Rajendra Singh met him and enquired about his well-being.

Mr. Manikant said his mother Meena Devi was concerned about Kanhaiya after the attack at the Patiala House Courts complex. — PTI
title: Mother asks student leader not to worry
